author: bayard
msg: Deleting the suite concept and telling M2 to go build the tests and ignore the base class. That way new tests will be autoadded rather than being missed.

author: bentmann
msg: o Decoupled ITs from production plugins

author: sisbell
msg: Removed artifact resolver. Now just using the repositorySystem directly.

author: seelmann
msg: Fix for DIRSTUDIO-419 and DIRSTUDIO-420: when the page size changed (i.e. by deleting entries) the old index was used and an AIOOB exception occured.

author: hlship
msg: TAP5-544: Improve JavaScript handling to prevent the user from clicking Ajax-oriented links and forms before the page is "ready"
